title: I rarely get a decent game these days.
body:
It's either:
1. An AFK.
2. A feeder (usually turns into an afk).
3. A rager (usually is also a feeder).
4. Someone who just got boosted.
5. Someone who's running a bad script.
6. Someone who dies 3 times typing "super naughty words" to the enemy team.

Strangely, whenever I actually get 5 teammates who have nothing wrong with them I win fairly easily.
